website_summaries.verdict: With room dividers to create four rooms and a door for each room, this tent has plenty of space.
pros: This 14-person base camp tent has room for five queen-sized air mattresses
Shaped like a cross, the center section has 6.5 feet of clearance
It has 12 windows, plenty of storage pockets, and an electrical access port
cons: The poles need to be handled carefully and can crack and break after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The tent is trash. It's spacious and easy to set up, but it is cheaply made. I had 3 of the 4 door arch poles snap, which ripped a hole in the tent and fly. I put in different poles and they hold. I called for replacement poles and they were out of stock, which tells me this is an ongoing problem. It's an over priced piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sauser

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized tent. Easy for me to assembly solo.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool tent. I like the fact that me and the wife’s queen sized bed gets its own room and the kids get their own room plus a room for storage. Then you still have the middle and entry way open. Let me tell you it’s a big tent! You may run into problems with small camp ground pads! Very comfortable and intuitive design.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G.

customer_reviews.title: Just consider what your goal is...
customer_reviews.text: We recently got back from our camping trip - our stuff got wet and a tent pole shattered. The tent is very roomy - love all the windows. I can't seem to find a good economical choice that keeps the rain off well enough. We even covered most of the tent with a large tarp, but the stakes didn't hold in the ground good against a storm and came out - which is when I assume the tent pole shattered and everything got wet. Maybe others have better luck with the tent, but it didn't do what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Different quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice tents but is the years go by things get made cheaper and cheaper the wall was ripped open the first time it was used
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my kids Birthday sleep over. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Crooms

customer_reviews.title: Good summer tent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a friend's family, so I've never actually camped in it. It has plenty of room for everything and everyone. No built in light, but plenty of places to put one. Also includes a port for an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: rsspiekerman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 45 min to set it up the day I got it, after that day, it has only taken me 20min. I suggest waterproofing it immediately and don't skimp out on waterproofing it (be liberal) hit the seams to be sure. The tent has been used about 9 times now and I have had no issues with any aspect of it. It takes two people to set it up but can be done by yourself, you will just need to adjust it once up. If you have a 6 person family, this tent is for you
customer_reviews.author: dpac09

customer_reviews.title: Good family tent.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today so my review cant cover durability. However I can say there were 2 holes in the netting, one on a window and then other in the roof. Small holes about the size of a dime, easy fix. The poles are not labeled well and it makes setting it up difficult. It has 3 rooms and one large walk in. Each room can fit one queen size mattress perfectly; no more space for anything else. It's very heavy but that was expected. So far I really like the tent
customer_reviews.author: Katie.fluffypanda

customer_reviews.title: 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Tent was perfect for our 8 person family.... Until it started a surprise shower in the night. Tent is not water proof at all ! Everything was soaked an yes we had the water proof cover on. There was no light in the tent but did have a hole to run for cord.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Chelstrom

customer_reviews.title: Rods need to be labeled and stronger.
customer_reviews.text: Product parts were not labeled and directions were not very clear. Tent broke because rods were flimsy. Size was great loved the way it looked. But never have I had a tent for a day and have it break. I had the same tents for almost 20 years until the zipper part broke.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Huge and perfect for lots of people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt to use with her in-home daycare kids. They love it! They haven't had a need for the light, and it hasn't been rainy enough to know how well it's waterproofed. It has lots of room for all of the kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge and fit for my friends just fine and we played games in the middle each one of us had our own little door to get in and out I have even taking it camping with the Boy Scouts it is easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: TheYooperStone

customer_reviews.title: hmmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: One of the flexible poles broke the first day. Other than that, its a spacious tent
customer_reviews.author: James Benn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent the only reason why I didn't give it a five stars because two of my poles broke the first day we put it up so we fix the poles to the best of our ability LOL its very roomy just be gentle with the poles that goes around the top
customer_reviews.author: Sincere

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Went out for 3 days and it held up great in a few severe storms.
customer_reviews.author: JTGIV

customer_reviews.title: HUGE tent
customer_reviews.text: Tent was easy to assemble, had a large amount of rain over the few days it was set up. One of the poles over a doorway broke on the first night so was disappointed. Tent is very large and comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious when set up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, 2 ppl had it set up in less than 30mins after glancing through directions as most men do. Only complaint is no light came with unit as described and no responce from manufacture when emailed about it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Happy Clark III

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It didnt rain when I went camping bout a month ago so I dont know how it holds in rain but the assembly is easy and inside is spacious. Whole family of 4 loves it no complaints!! Last night out we dropped the top and gazed at a beautiful star lit sky that rocked us to sleep!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome!! It has so much room and was not hard to assemble!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Broken poles
customer_reviews.text: Went to put the tent up and had 2 broken tent poles before we even got to use it .
customer_reviews.author: Allison O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Zippered rooms are awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this text especially the fact that the three times zip off for privacy! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: yoga4lovelisa

customer_reviews.title: it is a little bit of work to put away
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing if you need room! Roommmyyyy!! Not hard to set up either
customer_reviews.author: Amy Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: Tent was a little confusing to set up first time but the size of it and the space inside made up for it. Perfect for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Drollinger

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way I looked but the first night two rods broke and it leaked. I'm very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Echard

customer_reviews.title: A good and ez set up great for the family
customer_reviews.text: An easy set up lots of room fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really bad zipper design to keep animals and insect out
customer_reviews.text: Worst door design I have ever seen.... two separate zippers that zip down.... woke up to raccoons inside the tent because the zippers zip down to close giving them easy access to open them......
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy tent broke so badly it got left at the camp trash and didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: I took this tent on a trip for a week. The first night it mildly rained, all of the roof poles broke and punched holes in the rian fly. I was able to patch most of it with lots of tape to get through the week. But one of the poles broke so badly I had to roll up the room and tarp it over. We left it in the campground dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

product_meta.title: fortunershop Family Cabin Tent 14 Person Base Camp 4 Rooms Hiking Camping Shelter Outdoor
product_meta.description: Family Cabin Tent Sleep up to 14 campers in this huge base camp straight wall tent. It sets up easily with two people in 20 minutes. It features awesome ventilation with four doors and 12 windows, plus the mesh roof. The special sewn-in center zip room dividers convert the layout from one to two, three or even four separate rooms with privacy
feature_bullets: 4 doors provide separate exit/entry to each room 12 windows for great visibility and ventilation
Floor size: 20' x 20' Center height: 78" Sleeps up to 14 people
Set up time: 20 minutes 3 room dividers create 4 separate rooms Room dividers can be tied back to make 1 large room
Fits up to 5 queen air mattresses E-port provides easy access to extension cord Taped fly seams prevent leakage 2-3 season tent

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
